name: The Flame Within
description:
Are you working on your passion? if not what are you waiting for?

Join us in this short narrative journey on how to live your passion and balance your life.

the Game will take you through different phases of your life with multiple Endings depending on your choices during the game.

Can you get all the Endings? 

Controls:

  • A-D or Left and Right Key to Move
  • E to Interact

This Game was made by a team of four:

  • Programmer   Fadi Ashy aka Fadrik (Me)
  • Writer   Ahmad Madani
  • Artist   Nathen Wong
  • Composer   Nate Orr
